attr.title: Gotcha Gun
attr.desc: A 2nd place Winner in the itch.io, Bullet Hell Jam 5! Blast through the mechanical authorities and rob them while you're at it! Watch out! The more you steal, the stronger your enemies become!
attr.inst: Download free at itch.io https://doctor-succubus.itch.io/gotcha-gun and copy data.win and options.ini into assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download free at [itch.io](https://doctor-succubus.itch.io/gotcha-gun) and copy data.win and options.ini into assets folder.
